cmCourseInfo.description: Credit course for supervised participation in faculty research project. Details at http://www.artsci.utoronto.ca/current/course/rop. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
cmCourseInfo.title: Research Opportunity Program
cmCourseInfo.prerequisitesText: MAT135Y1/MAT137Y1/MAT157Y1; (PHY131H1, PHY132H1)/(PHY151H1, PHY152H1) or their equivalent
cmCourseInfo.recommendedPreparation: Physical science, mathematics and computation, or engineering

breadthTypes.description: BR=5 The Physical and Mathematical Universes

notes.content:
Timetable Instructions
For more information on how to enrol, please visit: http://www.artsci.utoronto.ca/current/focus/research#ROP

cmCourseInfo.description: Course credit for research under the supervision of a faculty member. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.

Completed at least 8.5 FCEs and no more
than 14.0 FCEs including courses in AST, CTA200H1, or permission
